member.name: T:SLB2PS4.SLB2
member.summary: SLB2 Class to handle the PS4'S SLB2 container

member.name: M:SLB2PS4.SLB2.ResetVars
member.summary: Reset the major Variables for the next SLB2 Container

member.name: M:SLB2PS4.SLB2.CheckHeader(System.String)
member.summary: Check SLB2 Magic of a SLB2 Container
member.returns: True if the File Magic do match the SLB2 Magic

member.name: M:SLB2PS4.SLB2.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Read the TOC of the SLB2 Container
member.param: The SLB2 Container to read the TOC from

member.name: M:SLB2PS4.SLB2.GetVersion
member.summary: Get the Version of the SLB2 Container (Need's Read() to be called once before)
member.returns: The version of the SLB2 Container

member.name: M:SLB2PS4.SLB2.GetFileCount
member.summary: Get File Count of SLB2 Container (Need's Read() to be called once before)
member.returns: File Count of the input SLB2 Container

member.name: M:SLB2PS4.SLB2.CheckSize
member.summary: Check the Size of the input SLB2 Container against the saved size in the header (Need's Read() to be called once before)
member.returns: True if the saved size in header do match the reall file size

member.name: M:SLB2PS4.SLB2.Extract(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The path where to save the extracted files
